snowell.name: LED Amber Bulb
snowell.url: ../src/assets/normal/bulb/4W B22 Laser-cut Filament LED G95 Round Amber 1800K Bulb.jpeg
snowell.description: A vintage-inspired G95 amber LED delivering warm 1800K light with a laser-cut filament aesthetic. Consumes just 4W while providing long service life and consistent color rendering—ideal for ambient and decorative fixtures.

reviews.name: Olivia Martin
reviews.comment: Beautiful warm glow and excellent build quality. The filament look is authentic and it instantly elevated my living room ambiance.

reviews.name: Samuel Turner
reviews.comment: Perfect for mood lighting—soft and non-glaring. I would have liked slightly higher lumens for reading tasks, but great for relaxation.

reviews.name: Priya Shah
reviews.comment: Stylish design and very energy efficient. Installation was straightforward and the color is consistently warm across fixtures.

reviews.name: Marcus Bell
reviews.comment: Reliable and attractive, though the price is a touch above standard bulbs. Still worth it for the aesthetic.

reviews.name: Hannah Ortega
reviews.comment: Gives a cozy, vintage feel to our café corner. Longevity looks promising—no flicker after several weeks of use.

snowell.name: Dimmable 8w Light Bulb
snowell.url: ../src/assets/normal/bulb/Dimmable Filament B22 GLS Light Bulb 8w LED 1100 Lumens.jpeg
snowell.description: An 8W dimmable filament-style GLS LED offering up to 1100 lumens with smooth, flicker-free dimming. Designed for both residential and hospitality use, it balances brightness with a classic filament silhouette.

reviews.name: Celia Robertson
reviews.comment: Excellent dimming range and no buzzing on my dimmer switch. Works well in our dining area for different lighting moods.

reviews.name: Jordan Hayes
reviews.comment: Very bright for its wattage and dims cleanly. Slightly warm tone which suits living spaces nicely.

reviews.name: Leila Morgan
reviews.comment: Good output and attractive filament design. One bulb arrived with a scuff but customer support sorted it quickly.

reviews.name: Tariq Ahmed
reviews.comment: Solid build and reliable dimming performance. Would recommend for pendant fixtures.

reviews.name: Maya Santos
reviews.comment: Bright and versatile, but note it leans slightly warm at low output. Still a great replacement for incandescent fixtures.

snowell.name: B22 GLS Light Bulb
snowell.url: ../src/assets/normal/bulb/Download AI generated Glowing light bulb on png background for free.jpeg

reviews.name: Ibrahim Musa
reviews.comment: Dependable and consistent output. Ideal for everyday fixtures where even light coverage matters.

reviews.name: Renee Collins
reviews.comment: Good value and stable color temperature. I used this in multiple ceiling fixtures with good results.

reviews.name: Diego Alvarez
reviews.comment: Solid replacement for standard bulbs; sturdy base and no early failures so far.

reviews.name: Amina Yusuf
reviews.comment: Performance is fine, though I expected a bit better CRI for task lighting. Works well for corridors and storage areas.

reviews.name: Noah Wallace
reviews.comment: Simple, effective lighting solution. No complaints for basic household use.

reviews.name: Ethan Green
reviews.comment: Well-made bulb; one of ours lasted longer than expected during heavy use. Satisfied overall.

reviews.name: Zara Khan
reviews.comment: Stylish but not very bright—use for ambience rather than reading. Packaging could be improved.

reviews.comment: Functional and dependable but not particularly decorative.

reviews.name: Sinead O'Connor
reviews.comment: Good value for two-way switching. No faults observed after months of use.

reviews.name: Marco Bellini
reviews.comment: Works as expected and feels durable. Recommended for practical installs.

snowell.name: Square 2-Way Gray Switch
snowell.description: A square-profile gray 2-way switch designed for a clean, modern look and reliable dual-location control. Suited to contemporary interiors where minimalist controls are desired.

reviews.name: Helena Fischer
reviews.comment: Modern styling and reliable action—an elegant upgrade for our hallway.

reviews.name: Jonas Berg
reviews.comment: Looks great and installs neatly. Function is smooth and dependable.

reviews.name: Amina Sadiq
reviews.comment: Good build but a touch pricier than standard white switches.

reviews.name: Tobias Klein
reviews.comment: No issues after extended use and the finish holds up well.

reviews.name: Chiara Romano
reviews.comment: A refined finish and consistent switching. Happy with the purchase.

reviews.name: Omar Aziz
reviews.comment: Good tactile feedback and easy to wire. The finish feels premium.

reviews.name: Leanne Kim

reviews.name: Rory MacLeod
reviews.comment: Solid product—no issues after regular household use.

reviews.name: Sofia Almeida
reviews.comment: Stylish and dependable. Great for visible rooms where finish matters.

reviews.name: Aisha Thomson
reviews.comment: Looks very contemporary and the finish holds up well to use.

reviews.comment: Good build quality though fingerprints show on the metallic surface.

reviews.name: Rhea Kapoor
reviews.comment: Solid and responsive—installation was straightforward.

reviews.name: Jamal Roberts
reviews.comment: Good value for a stylish switch—no complaints.

reviews.name: Amelia Joyce
reviews.comment: Reliable and nicely finished. Works well throughout the house.

reviews.comment: Good looking and solid. Recommended for functional rooms.

reviews.name: Zoe Clarke

reviews.name: Lina Hoffman
